databases.title: Develop your databases instead of worrying about them.
databases.subtitle: Our managed databases remove the burden of administration, enabling you to focus on your applications and products.
databases.description1: No matter what you are running – SQL, NoSQL, or caching – we have the solution. Get your preferred database engine up and running in minutes with our range of managed solutions: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Valkey.
databases.description2: Our teams manage the infrastructure, backups, and monitoring, so you can focus on developing high-performance applications, not maintaining servers.
databases.description3: Plus, you can start small and scale effortlessly as your data grows, all with predictable pricing, data sovereignty, and integrated high availability.
databases.tile.quickStart.title: Quick Start
databases.tile.quickStart.content: Find all the guides and tutorials for our managed databases
databases.tile.documentation.title: Documentation and tutorials
databases.tile.documentation.content: Find out how to quickly deploy your first managed database.
databases.tile.freeTier.title: MongoDB Free Tier
databases.tile.freeTier.content: Get your first MongoDB cluster, with a lifetime free plan.
databases.tile.freeTier.cta: Create your MongoDB instance in two clicks
analytics.title: Make your data work for you, not against you.
analytics.subtitle: Thanks to our fully managed analytics engines, you can free yourself from the burden of administration and focus on your applications and products.
analytics.description1: Analyse, search, and monitor your data at scale, without the need to manage complex infrastructure.
analytics.description2: Deploy Kafka, ClickHouse, OpenSearch, or Grafana in minutes to optimise your data flows, analytics, and observability workloads.
analytics.description3: Get better visibility and performance in dashboards and data pipelines, while retaining full control and ensuring data sovereignty.
analytics.tile.quickStart.title: Quick Start
analytics.tile.quickStart.content: Learn how to quickly deploy your managed pipelines and dashboards.
analytics.tile.documentation.title: Documentation and tutorials
analytics.tile.documentation.content: Find all the guides and tutorials for our managed Analytics engines
analytics.tile.integrations.title: Integrations
analytics.tile.integrations.content: Connect seamlessly to your databases, Object Storage, or Kubernetes clusters.
